claim: The Sunnah is related to the Quran.
premise_source_doc_sentence: `` Sunnah is included in The Quran , everything differs from Quran is not Sunnah , neither do narrations which add to the Quran , because Quran is Complete ''

claim: The Sunnah is related to the Quran.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The sunnah of Muhammad includes his specific words  (  Sunnah Qawliyyah  )  , habits , practices  (  Sunnah Fiiliyyah  )  , and silent approvals  (  Sunnah Taqririyyah  )  .

claim: The Sunnah is related to the Quran.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Quran  (  the holy book of Islam  )  and the Sunnah make up the two primary sources of Islamic theology and law .

claim: The Sunnah is related to the Quran.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Islamic commercial jurisprudence entails the rules of transacting finance or other economic activity in a Shari'a compliant manner , i.e. , a manner conforming to Islamic scripture  (  Quran and sunnah  )  .

claim: The Sunnah is related to the Quran.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The central features of an Islamic economy are often summarized as :  (  1  )  the `` behavioral norms and moral foundations '' derived from the Quran and Sunnah ;  (  2  )  collection of zakat and other Islamic taxes ,  (  3  )  prohibition of interest  (  riba  )  charged on loans .
